actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs (Formerly:  Interior and Insular Affairs)
actions.text: Rereferred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs (Formerly:  Interior and Insular Affairs).

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to pay certain legal and other expenses incurred by all parties to the action commenced by the Northern Cheyenne Tribe pursuant to the act of July 24, 1968 (82 Stat. 424, 425).

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to pay all legal fees and expenses arising out of the case brought by the Northern Cheyenne Tribe against William Hollowbreast, et al.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to pay certain legal and other expenses incurred by all parties to the action commenced by the Northern Cheyenne Tribe pursuant to the act of July 24, 1968 (82 Stat. 424, 425).
